title: Instructional Design Practical Competency Enhancement: Creative Problem-Solving for Sustainable Society Design

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Can identify three sustainability issues in local communities and write problem definition documents based on scientific evidence
Can propose at least two creative solutions reflecting diverse perspectives through stakeholder role-playing
Can derive final design plans through peer review and submit project deliverables to the LMS
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
